annotation.spannedText: Healthcare providers should ensure that all of their patients are current on MMR (measles, mumps, and rubella) vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Healthcare providers should ensure that all of their patients are current on MMR (measles, mumps, and rubella) vaccine

annotation.spannedText: They should consider measles in the differential diagnosis of patients with fever and rash and ask patients about recent international travel or travel to domestic venues frequented by international travelers

classMention.mentionClass: They should consider measles in the differential diagnosis of patients with fever and rash and ask patients about recent international travel or travel to domestic venues frequented by international travelers

annotation.spannedText: They should also ask patients about their history of measles exposures in their community. Please disseminate this information to healthcare providers in hospitals and emergency rooms, to primary care providers, and to microbiology laboratories

classMention.mentionClass: They should also ask patients about their history of measles exposures in their community. Please disseminate this information to healthcare providers in hospitals and emergency rooms, to primary care providers, and to microbiology laboratories

annotation.spannedText: it is likely that a traveler (or more than one traveler) who was infected with measles overseas visited one or both of the Disney parks in December during their infectious period

classMention.mentionClass: it is likely that a traveler (or more than one traveler) who was infected with measles overseas visited one or both of the Disney parks in December during their infectious period

annotation.spannedText: the first of which should be administered when the child is 12 through 15 months of age and the second at least 28 days later

classMention.mentionClass: the first of which should be administered when the child is 12 through 15 months of age and the second at least 28 days later
